cgcloud__Sell_Sheet__c.name: cgcloud__Sell_Sheet__c
cgcloud__Sell_Sheet__c.description: This object contains the attributes that are associated with the sell sheet to be used on the Sales folder. This object is available in API version 54.0 and later.

LastReferencedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

cgcloud__Description__c.description: Description based on the user-specified language.

cgcloud__Note__c.description: General note about the sell sheet.

cgcloud__Sales_Org__c.description: Describes the sales organization to which the sell sheet belongs.
